name: The Sims 4 Household Data File
summary: Learn about .HHI files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You will most likely encounter an HHI file only if you are looking to modify game content for The Sims 4. The file is part of a set of files that contain various information about a Sims 4 household. For example, a household with two sims consists of the following five files:
2 SGI files (each sim gets their own SGI file)
These files can be found in the Tray folder in the following directories:
Windows XP - C:/​Documents and Settings/​[username]/​My Documents/​Electronic Arts/​The Sims 4/​
NOTE: You may also encounter HHI files when browsing files used by the Xbox One and PlayStation 4 versions of The Sims 4.

instructions: To use an HHI file with The Sims 4, place it in the game's Tray folder along with the file's accompanying TRAYITEM, HOUSEHOLDBINARY, and SGI files. The content your files contain will then appear in the game.
